Articles.Content:
Yup lads !

Long time reader here, I finally decided to register to bring you two mission report, one is an old album and the next one is my current project so expect updates.

I usually try to make accurate descriptions and lots of shoots. Tell me what you think of it !

Mods are detailed in the last picture of the album description.

First : An elaborate way to explore Duna

Javascript is disabled. View full album

And my current project : the HEAVY -that's his name- interplanetary explorer
